message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can't go as low as $105. How about we try $112? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $108? It's a bit of a stretch for me, but I really want the product.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we meet at $115? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $110? I'm really close to my limit, but I'm willing to stretch a bit if it means getting the product.
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $116? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm really close to my limit. I'm willing to go up to $114, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $117? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I'm really sorry, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I can't go any higher. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I appreciate your time and effort, but I think I'll have to look elsewhere.
